mnist.command: wget https://docker-76009.sz.gfp.tencent-cloud.com/github/cube-studio/inference/tf-mnist.tar.gz && tar -zxvf tf-mnist.tar.gz && mkdir -p /models/mnist/202207281/ && cp -r tf-mnist/* /models/mnist/202207281/ && /usr/bin/tf_serving_entrypoint.sh --model_config_file=/config/models.config --monitoring_config_file=/config/monitoring.config --platform_config_file=/config/platform.config
